name: Godot Ball
description:
Silly little game made for #stopwaitingforgodot game jam using the theme "Keep it Simple"!

CONTROLS & HOW TO PLAY:

Avoid the other player's balls for as long as you  can! The player that outlasts their opponent wins!

Player 1:

A & D - Move left & right

W / F - Jump

Player 2:

Left Arrow & Right Arrow - Move Left & Right

Up Arrow & 0 (Numpad) - Jump

CREDITS:

Game developed by Brendan Hewson in Godot Engine

Sound design & Music by Laura Ryder (insta: @laurarydermusic, portfolio: https://hewsonb1.wixsite.com/lauraryderportfolio)

Enjoy!
